package.name: hwi/oauth-bundle
package.description: Support for authenticating users using both OAuth1.0a and OAuth2 in Symfony2.

dev-master.name: hwi/oauth-bundle
dev-master.description: Support for authenticating users using both OAuth1.0a and OAuth2 in Symfony2.

suggest.friendsofsymfony\/user-bundle: to connect FOSUB with this bundle
suggest.symfony\/twig-bundle: to use the Twig hwi_oauth_* functions
suggest.symfony\/property-access: to use FOSUB integration with this bundle
